text:
="preserve">Roland Daggett is a fictional Batman character who owns Daggett Industries a rival of Bruce Wayne. He had created Clayface the way he is and had tried to corrupt Wayne Enterprises. He uses his medicine company to try to take control over animals of the people of Gotham from mind-control.
He was voiced by Ed Asner in '. He was played by Ben Mendelsohn as John Daggett in "The Dark Knight Rises".
